rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0002
rows.name: Let's hurry, before they can follow us inside![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0004
rows.name: Our real bodies... We can finally be whole again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0005
rows.name: Attention: this is Lifehold Core Control.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0006
rows.name: System energy levels have dropped below zero point two.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0007
rows.name: Shielding will be disabled in T-minus one-thousand seconds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0009
rows.name: What? 15 minutes and we lose the shields?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0010
rows.name:
If the Core runs out of power,
the shields will be the least of our problems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0012
rows.name:
We need to keep the Core powered,
but we do also need those shields.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0013
rows.name: It's two birds with one stone's throw away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0014
rows.name:
The shields will cause the Ganglion
to use up their materiel and retreat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Exactly. Everything comes down to
getting the backup power source online.[ST:wait ]
